channel.title: Softlayer_virtual_reservedcapacitygroup_instance on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_ReservedCapacityGroup_Instance
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_ReservedCapacityGroup_Instance Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Virtual_ReservedCapacityGroup_Instance reserves capacity for a single instance of a reserved capacity group. Methods getAvailableFlag Retrieve flag to indecate whether or not the reserved instance is available or not. getBillingItem Retrieve the billing item for the reserved capacity group instance. getGuest Retrieve the virtual guest associated with this reserved capacity group instance. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Virtual_ReservedCapacityGroup_Instance record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_ReservedCapacityGroup_Instance
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_ReservedCapacityGroup_Instance Service Datatype Description This data type presents the structure for a virtual reserved capacity group instance. Local createDate The date that the reserved capacity group instance was created. Type: dateTime guestId The virtual guest ID associated with this reserved capacity group instance. Type: integer id The reserved capacity group instance's associated unique ID. Type: integer

item.title: getReservedCapacityGroup
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_ReservedCapacityGroup_Instance::getReservedCapacityGroup Retrieve the reserved instances that are members of this reserved capacity group.
